name: 3D Zombie Killer (17+) - The Walking Night Of Terror Assault Force Edition
name_original: 3D Zombie Killer (17+) - The Walking Night Of Terror Assault Force Edition
description:
Get ready for a "end of days" shooting game where you play the last line of defense from a group of zombies trying to take control of the last sanctuary on earth! It's you armed with an assortment of high powered guns, grenades, & rocket launchers.

You are mankind's last hope.. lets see if you can make us proud!

FEATURES

- Lots of zombies to destroy!
- Cool apocalyptic graphics!
- Cool sound effects!
